page.title: 07The day of a farmer's boy 4
page.content: Usually a job like this may carry on tight the way through the rest of the evening. Sometimes the engine in the Fiat tractors don not stop working until 10.00 pm. In the case of last Thursday it was just after ten o clock before we reached the farmhouse for supper.Supper is made by my Mum who starts to boil the kettle as soon as she spots the tractor entering the gate in the huge yard. I had a cup of coffee and some chocolate biscuits. After a quick look at the television it's up to bed for a good night's sleep. Until the alarm wakes me the following day. YADSEMOD03520492
